clinical_study.brief_title: Exercise Adherence of Home-based Cardiac Rehabilitation
clinical_study.official_title: Qualitative Research on the Influencing Factors of Exercise Adherence of Home-based Cardiac Rehabilitation in Patients With Coronary Artery Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The study explored the influencing factors of exercise adherence of home-based cardiac rehabilitation in patients with coronary artery disease.

detailed_description.textblock: The study used a qualitative exploratory design. Informants were recruited by purposive sampling. Semi-structured individual interviews were conducted among patients with coronary artery disease and medical professionals in home-based cardiac rehabilitation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: The influencing factors of exercise adherence in home-based cardiac rehabilitation will be measured by the construct of the theory of planned behavior through study completion, an average of 5 months
primary_outcome.description: Influencing factors of exercise adherence in home-based cardiac rehabilitation
